title: New: Gotye – Somebody That I Used To Know (Groundislava Remix)
content:
After you’ve been subjected to a track for the Millionth time, to seal the deal, what you really need is a remix of said track.

Now before anyone freaks, I’m rather fond of Gotye’s ‘Somebody That I Used To Know’, that said, if another kid proudly puts it on at a house party as if it’s some sort of grand discovery, I might have to kill them.

Cynicism aside, L.A based producer Groundislava’s take on last years’ hit is a slightly farcical, yet welcome cut of the record.

Ok, maybe not all the cynicism aside, it is me after all.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
